= Raspberry Pi configuration =

#1 install / flash SD card with "Ubuntu image for PaspberryPi"
#2 log in and change the default password
#3 copy public key to .ssh/authorized_keys
#4 logout and login in order to verify the login with the keypair
#5 run the ansible playbook in order to configure the new Ubuntu server
*REF:  wiki/techno/ansible/play-linux-new-server/readMe.txt
